example.code: $ruleset = @( @{IpRule = "10.0.3.0/20"; RuleDesc = "This is updated Rule 1"}, @{IpRule = "10.0.4.0/20"; RuleDesc = "This is updated Rule 2"} Update-WKSRulesOfIpGroup -GroupId wsipg-abcde4wer -UserRule $ruleset
example.description: This sample updates an existing IP Group with two new IP Rules
